## Problem 1

load the data from packages

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
data("ny_noaa")
```

data cleaning

```{r}
ny_noaa_df = ny_noaa |>
  mutate(
    date = as.Date(date),
    year = year(date),
    month = month(date),
    day = day(date),
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax) / 10,  
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin) / 10,  
    prcp = as.numeric(prcp) / 10,
    snow = snow
  ) %>%
  filter(!is.na(tmax) & !is.na(tmin) & !is.na(snow) & !is.na(prcp)) 

ny_noaa_df
```
